skillList.skill_desc: 可以复现常见的非肿瘤疾病生信文章
掌握eqtl，pqtl相关分析, 免疫细胞，炎症因子分析会一点点,

workList.work_name: Xu M, Zhou H, Hu P, et al. Identification and validation of immune and oxidative stress-related diagnostic markers for diabetic nephropathy by WGCNA and machine learning. Front Immunol. 2023 Feb 22;14:1084531.

Zhou H, Xu M, Hu P, et al. Identifying hub genes and common biological pathways between COVID-19 and benign prostatic hyperplasia by machine learning algorithms. Front Immunol. 2023 Jun 23;14:1172724.

WANG H, CHENG W, HU P, et al. Integrative analysis identifies oxidative stress biomarkers in non-alcoholic fatty liver disease via machine learning and weighted gene co-expression network analysis [J]. Frontiers in immunology, 2024, 15.

aboutme.aboutme_desc:
🌱 专注于科研领域
1、在生物信息学领域，我精通差异分析、功能分析、免疫浸润及单细胞测序等技术。通过机器学习，参与鉴定疾病生物标志物。
2、在孟德尔随机化分析方面具备丰富经验，熟练处理两样本MR、SMR等数据。
3、持有执业医师证书，专业与实践经验兼备。
